get.summary: Gets all pages in no particular order, unless otherwise specified in the query arguments.

Gets the pages of an exhibit in the correct order (as specified in the exhibit),
unless otherwise specified in the query arguments.

Type.description: If not null, only pages of the specified type are returned.

IncludeOnly.description:
If set, only these IDs are included in the response.
If null, all IDs are included in the response.
In both cases, the filter  still applies.

Page.description: The page number. Defaults to one, which is the first page.

PageSize.description:
Maximum number of entities in the response. The last page may have less entities,
all other pages have exactly  entities.

OrderBy.description: The field to order the response data by.

Query.description:
Restricts the reponse results to the objects containing the queried string in a text field
(title/name, description).

Status.description:
Restricts the reponse to objects with the given status or specifies that all objects irrespective
of their status shall be returned. Defaults to .

ReferenceInfoResult.description:
For a particular resource, a  provides information about
(1) which other resources it references (or "uses"), and
(2) which other resources are referencing (or "using") it

OutgoingReferences.description: The resources referenced by the current resource.

IncomingReferences.description: The resources referencing the current resource.

Created.description:
The time and date when the entity was created.
If the entity is effectively non-existent (i.e. has never been created or has been deleted),
no value is set.

LastModified.description:
The time and date of the last creation, update or deletion.
If the entity is effectively non-existent (i.e. has never been created or has been deleted),
no value is set.

Deleted.description:
The time and date when the entity was deleted.
A value is only set if the entity has been created and deleted before, but not (yet) recreated.

Owner.description: The ID of the user who created the entity.

Changes.description: A list of individual modifications (including creation and deletion).

Used.description:
If null, all objects are returned. If set to true (resp. false), only the objects referenced
(resp. not referenced) by another object are returned.

File.description:
The URL from which the file can be downloaded.
For images, a URL pointing to the thumbnail service.
For audio, a URL pointing to "GET /api/Media/{id}/File".
